title: A defence of The antidote against Mr. Baxter's palliated cure of church divisions wherein Mr. Baxter's contradictions and inconsistences ... are clearly discovered, and the great question about conformity briefly stated in a letter to Mr. Richard Baxter / by Edward Bagshaw.
author: Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.
notes: Imperfect: print show-through with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
